posts.post_content: Ignoring the pro-land, this is blues most powerful flying 3 drop without any drawbacks other then [Vendilion Clique](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Vendilion Clique), and that's if I'm not counting being legendary as a drawback. And by most powerful I mean that its power (being 3) is higher. The pro-land just makes this card sexy.
posts.html:

Posted By: DoragonShinzui (3/29/2012 9:46:09 AM)

posts.post_content:
"Protection from lands works like any other protection ability. Horizon Drake can't be blocked by land creatures, all damage that would be dealt to it by lands (including combat damage from land creatures) is prevented, and it can't be the target of activated or triggered abilities from lands (**including your own Teetering Peaks**, for example)."
  
   
Wow, I didn't know I had a Teetering Peaks.
